***Winter averaging months are December, January, and February--we will take your consumption from these months and averaged them to determine your sewer rate for 2026. Remember, the less water you use, the lower your rate is.***

The City of Poteet now offers the option to Register your Utility Account Online.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

* ### Sign up for Auto Pay Just Click the "Utility Bill Pay PIC" Option on the top left side of the screen or on the link: [https://poteettx.merchanttransact.com /](https://poteettx.merchanttransact.com/)
